name: Penguins Escape — Physics Puzzle Game
description: Things are heating up here in the Arctic! The sun is out, global warming has had noticeable effect, and everything is starting to melt. Deep within the Arctic is a small colony of adorable penguins. They’re a bit simple, and a bit reckless, but are reigned over by their glorious king, King Penguin. He notices that something must be done, and must make the tough calls to ensure the colony’s survival.
